00025    // Constructor
00026    SemiGrandDistribution::SemiGrandDistribution(McSystem& system)
00027     : SystemDiagnostic<McSystem>(system),
00028       outputFile_(),
00029       distribution_(),
00030       speciesId_(-1),
00031       moleculeCapacity_(-1),
00032       speciesPtr_(0),
00033       mutatorPtr_(0)
00034    {}
00035 
00036    void SemiGrandDistribution::readParam(std::istream& in)
00037    {
00038       readInterval(in);
00039       readOutputFileName(in);
00040       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00041 
00042       speciesPtr_ = &(system().simulation().species(speciesId_));
00043       moleculeCapacity_ = speciesPtr_->capacity();
00044       if (moleculeCapacity_ <= 0) {
00045          UTIL_THROW("Error: moleculeCapacity <= 0");
00046       }
00047       if (!speciesPtr_->isMutable()) {
00048          UTIL_THROW("Error: Species must be mutable");
00049       }
00050       mutatorPtr_ = &speciesPtr_->mutator();
00051      
00052       // Allocate IntDistribution accumulator
00053       distribution_.setParam(0, moleculeCapacity_);
00054       distribution_.clear();
00055 
00056    }
00057  
00058    // Sample occupation
00059    void SemiGrandDistribution::sample(long iStep) 
00060    {
00061       if (isAtInterval(iStep)) {
00062          distribution_.sample(mutatorPtr_->stateOccupancy(0));
00063       }
00064    }
00065  
00066    /*
00067    * Summary
00068    */
00069    void SemiGrandDistribution::output() 
00070    {
00071       // Open and write summary file
00072       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00073       distribution_.output(outputFile_);
00074       //double norm = 1.0/double(nSample_);
00075       //for (int i = 0; i < moleculeCapacity_; ++i) {
00076       //   outputFile_ << Int(i,5) 
00077       //               << Dbl(distribution_[i]*norm, 15) << std::endl;
00078       //}
00079       outputFile_.close();
00080    }
